title: Sunset Dreams
description: A vivid portrayal of the Philippine sunset using warm tones and soft brush strokes that evoke a sense of calm and nostalgia.

title: Harmony
description: An abstract exploration of balance and emotion through mixed media, reflecting the unity between chaos and order.

title: The Market Life
description: Depicts the lively and colorful atmosphere of a Filipino wet market with incredible attention to detail and local culture.

title: Whispers of Nature
description: A gentle watercolor painting capturing the serenity of pine trees and mountain mist, inspired by Baguio mornings.

title: Faith
description: A portrait of an elderly woman in deep prayer, symbolizing strength and resilience through faith and time.

title: Golden Fields
description: A wide panoramic view of rice fields at harvest time under the glowing afternoon sun, celebrating rural life and abundance.

title: Echoes of Time
description: A surreal representation of memory and time, blending dreamlike imagery with symbolic Filipino elements.

title: Motherâ€™s Love
description: A tender portrait showing the deep bond between mother and child using expressive lighting and realism.
